Title: Relates to access to recorded personal medical information by individuals
Summary: Relates to access to recorded personal medical information by individuals; allows individuals access to their recorded personal medical records and limits any insurance institution, agent or insurance-support organization from charging more than one dollar per page to cover the costs incurred in providing a copy of such information to the individual.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to access to recorded personal medical information
